sections.intro: Uniswap Labs builds products that help millions of people access DeFi simply and securely ‚Äí from the Uniswap Web App and Wallet to crypto infrastructure like the Uniswap Trading API, and Unichain. Uniswap Labs also contributes to the development of the Uniswap Protocol, which has processed over $2.9 trillion in volume across thousands of tokens on Ethereum and 12+ other chains. When you join Uniswap Labs, you become part of a team that's reshaping the way value flows on the internet.
responsibilities: To grow Uniswap Labs via organic and community efforts in APAC. Also, to continually share product feedback and market intel to drive Uniswap Labs‚Äô growth and success in APAC.
Be in the mix, be deep in the local crypto community. Represent Uniswap Labs everywhere ‚Äî and share market intel back with HQ
Serve as representative in Discord, triaging across internal Uniswap Labs teams, spanning support, developer relations, and community
Actively advocate for Uniswap Labs‚Äô brand and technology in relevant community channels, including Telegram,¬† to develop a local, loyal and growing community
Organize small local meet-ups with clear outcome of educating and promoting Uniswap Labs‚Äô developer tools
Propose joint efforts with relevant crypto projects in the region to increase activation
Provide weekly reports on activities, metrics, and new proposals
Background as a community manager with deep technical expertise on trading protocols
Self-identified crypto degen who has deep involvement in the crypto and in particular the crypto trading community over several years in APAC.
Deep understanding of Uniswap protocol and related products to the point where they can answer most questions about how to use, value props, comparison to other products/protocols, etc.
requirements: Relevant experience in the field
Strong communication and collaboration skills
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
nice_to_haves: Love for unicorns :)

sections.intro: The Uniswap Labs team is building products to unlock value through universal exchange. We envision a future where digital economies flourish, and markets are transparent, global, and equitable. Our products ‚Äì the Uniswap Interface, the Uniswap Mobile App, and the Uniswap Extension ‚Äì are powered by the Uniswap Protocol.¬† The protocol is the largest onchain marketplace, with billions of dollars in weekly volume across thousands of tokens on Ethereum and 8+ additional chains. When you join Uniswap, you become part of a team that's reshaping the way value flows on the internet. Uniswap Labs is hiring a Customer Support Associate. You will have the opportunity to shape our customer support values, function, systems and processes. We are often an early touch point for web3 users, and receive inq...
responsibilities: Provide user support via Zendesk
Act as an advocate and onboarding specialist for users
The first touch point for all user issues, responsible for ensuring that every inquiry is handled in accordance to our SLAs
Synthesize insights from user interactions and surface critical issues to the Engineering team
Assist in designing, implementing and operating user support processes to ensure the team meets goals
Systematically communicate feedback to key stakeholders, providing guidance and input on new product features
Keep internal and external informational resources up to date in an environment of rapid iteration
requirements: 2+ years experience doing customer support in a high growth environment
Strong written and verbal communication skills that can effectively distill complex concepts into simple ones
You are motivated by helping others and are the type of person who prides themselves on turning an angry user into a 5-star rating
You can help solve complex problems end-to-end so as to mitigate delegation as much as possible
nice_to_haves: Experience with user onboarding at a software company
Experience with DeFi, knowledge of blockchains, and experience using crypto wallets is a (big) plus!
Love for the unicorns ü¶Ñ

Minimum full-time salary of $134,000-$142,000. Disclosure in accordance with New York City's Pay Transparency Law. Full Time employees at Uniswap Labs are also eligible for other compensation elements, including equity, tokens, and benefits, dependent on the position type.

Uniswap Labs' Full-Time employee benefits include company-paid medical, dental, & vision for you and your dependents, gym subsidy, 401(k) with 4% employer contribution, annual $1,500 education stipend, unlimited and encouraged time off, up to 16 weeks paid parental leave, home office setup stipend for remote employees and daily lunches at NY headquarters (all benefits are subject to applicable taxes and based on eligibility).

sections.intro: The Uniswap Protocol is the largest decentralized trading and automated market making protocol (often called a DEX, ‚ÄúDecentralized Exchange‚Äù) on Ethereum. The Uniswap Labs team was a major contributor to the Uniswap Protocol and now focuses on building a suite of products to support the Uniswap Labs ecosystem. Our team is one of the most impactful in crypto. We are headquartered in SoHo in New York City with the option to be partially or fully remote. Uniswap Labs is hiring a Customer Support Specialist. You will have the opportunity to shape our customer support values, function, systems and processes. We are often an early touch point for web3 users, and receive inquiries outside of our product space. You will create a way for folks to feel heard and supported externally, and also work i...
responsibilities: Provide user support via Zendesk
Act as an advocate and onboarding specialist for users
The first touch point for all user issues, responsible for ensuring that every inquiry is handled in accordance to our SLAs
Synthesize insights from user interactions and surface critical issues to the Engineering team
Assist in designing, implementing and operating user support processes to ensure the team meets goals
Systematically communicate feedback to key stakeholders, providing guidance and input on new product features
Keep internal and external informational resources up to date in an environment of rapid iteration
requirements: 2+ years experience doing customer support in a high growth environment
Strong written and verbal communication skills that can effectively distill complex concepts into simple ones
You are motivated by helping others and are the type of person who prides themselves on turning an angry user into a 5-star rating
You can help solve complex problems end-to-end so as to mitigate delegation as much as possible
nice_to_haves: Experience with user onboarding at a software company
Experience with DeFi, knowledge of blockchains, and experience using crypto wallets is a (big) plus!
Love for the unicorns ü¶Ñ

Minimum full-time salary of $67,000-$93,000. Disclosure in accordance with New York City's Pay Transparency Law. Full Time employees at Uniswap Labs are also eligible for other compensation elements, including equity, tokens, and benefits, dependent on the position type.

Uniswap Labs' Full-Time employee benefits include unlimited and encouraged time off, company-paid medical, dental, & vision for you and your dependents, gym subsidy, 401(k) participation, annual $1,500 education stipend, up to 16 weeks paid parental leave, home office setup stipend for remote employees and daily lunches at NY headquarters (all benefits are subject to applicable taxes and based on eligibility).

sections.intro: The Uniswap Labs team is building products to unlock value through universal exchange. We envision a future where digital economies flourish, and markets are transparent, global, and equitable. Our products ‚Äì the Uniswap Interface, the Uniswap Mobile App, and the Uniswap Extension ‚Äì are powered by the Uniswap Protocol.¬† The protocol is the largest onchain marketplace, with billions of dollars in weekly volume across thousands of tokens on Ethereum and 8+ additional chains. When you join Uniswap, you become part of a team that's reshaping the way value flows on the internet. Uniswap Labs is seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Customer Experience Content Manager to join our team. This role will focus on creating and managing content for our Help Center, ensuring users have access to accu...
responsibilities: Content Creation & Management: Develop, write, and manage Help Center articles, ensuring content is clear, accurate, and accessible to our users. Collaborate with Product, Design, and Engineering teams to align content with product launches and updates.

Issue Identification & Resolution: Proactively identify gaps and opportunities in current Help Center content, proposing and implementing solutions to enhance user experience and improve ticket deflection ratios.
Systems Thinking: Approach challenges with a systems-thinking mindset, understanding how different components interact and influence the overall user experience.
Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional partners to set goals, plan content strategies, and ensure that constraints and dependencies are addressed.

Project Leadership: Lead the design and execution of content-related projects, operating at the team level and starting to engage in cross-team initiatives. Accountable for planning and executing tasks within a 1-2 quarter horizon.
Autonomy & Accountability: Operate independently on day-to-day tasks, with work reviewed at critical milestones. Receive general instructions on new assignments as needed.
requirements: 5+ years of relevant experience
Proven experience in content creation, preferably in a technical or customer support environment.
Bachelor‚Äôs degree; or equivalent work experience.
Strong problem-solving skills and ability to take initiative.
Experience working with cross-functional teams.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Systems thinker with the ability to see the big picture and understand the interconnectedness of various components.
nice_to_haves: Familiarity with cryptocurrency and blockchain technology.

Minimum full-time salary of $152,000-$170,000. Disclosure in accordance with New York City's Pay Transparency Law. Full Time employees at Uniswap Labs are also eligible for other compensation elements, including equity, tokens, and benefits, dependent on the position type.

Advocate for partner needs internally, influencing product improvements based on feedback.

Technically proficient, able to understand and troubleshoot complex integration challenges.
Strategic thinker who can identify inefficiencies and build scalable processes for managing partner interactions.
Proactive and independent, taking ownership of challenges and driving solutions.
Interested in DeFi and blockchain technologies, with a willingness to learn and grow in the space.
